articles.content: From Unilever Plc to Colgate-Palmolive Co., consumer goods makers in India are facing distribution blues that have nothing to do with pandemic-induced shortages and bottlenecks. The trusted middlemen… [+5809 chars]

articles.title: Top 10 things to know before the market opens - Moneycontrol.com
articles.description: Trends on SGX Nifty indicate a cautious opening for the index in India with an 14-point gain.
articles.content:
The Indian stock market is expected to open flat as trends on SGX Nifty indicate a cautious opening for the index in India with a 14-point gain.
